issues.message: Trivial assertion in 'one equals one': always passes and does not verify behavior — expect(1).toBe(1)
issues.suggestion: Assert on the actual result of the code under test (e.g. expect(actualResult).toBe(expected)) instead of literals.

issues.message: Test 'one equals one' only has trivial assertions — it does not test any real behavior
issues.suggestion: Replace with assertions on the result of the code under test (e.g. expect(myFunction()).toBe(expected)).

issues.message: Trivial assertion in 'true is true': always passes and does not verify behavior — expect(true).toBe(true)
